description:
**Now optimized for the TouchPad!
Use the "title bar" in each scene as your back button**

This is THE app for Lovatics!

Get the lyrics to Demi's songs, her recent tweets & more right on your webOS device!

If you see a picture, try tapping it or swiping it; there may be more pictures waiting for you ;-)


Change log:

v1.0.9 Added MTV Special info
Added more tattoos

v1.0.8 Added 17 Magazine
Added Glamour Magazine
Added Awards
Added Filmography
Added Merchandise links
Added Donate button
Added more pictures!
Added a special .mp3 intro to Unbroken

v1.0.7 "Ringtone" clips now work on the Pixi!
Added Give Your Heart a Break single album art
Added lots of Demi quotes
And more!

v1.0.6 Optimized for TouchPad
Added Camp Rock lyrics
Added Flickr photos
Added Latina Magazine info
Added Official Sites
Added LOTS of pictures!

v1.0.5 Added lyrics for Moves Me, Camp Rock 2, and Sonny With A Chance.
Added links to YouTube videos.
Added concert dates for "A Special Night with Demi Lovato"
Fixed typos

v1.0.4 Added Unbroken lyrics.
Added "ringtone" clips to Unbroken album.
Added 'About' page.
Optimized for Pre3 screen size.

v1.0.3 All lyrics should now be 100% correct.
Added pics and info on her tattoos.

v1.0.2 Fixed lyrics in the album Don't Forget.
Added place holder for Unbroken

-=-=-=-


I'm an official Lovatic!
Find me in Demi's official fan club; user name: roneyii
Follow me on Twitter: @roneyii


#3 Fan is not associated with Demi Lovato or Hollywood Records.
E-mails sent through the app will reach the app developer, not Miss Lovato.
